The '''Heavenly Weeping''' is a ninjutsu used by Tobirama Senju.

== Usage ==
A technique in which chakra is kneaded in the user's body, transformed into water and then shaped into [[senbon]] in the mouth before finally being expelled at a high velocity. The needles are shot in an attempt to catch the enemy off guard, while also aiming at their vitals.

== Trivia ==
* {{translation|Tenkyū|天泣|lit meaning=Heavenly Weeping}} is the Japanese term for rain that falls from a cloudless sky.
* [[Shizune]],<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 165</ref> [[Hidari (missing-nin)|Hidari]]<ref>''Boruto'' episode 41</ref> and [[Kirisaki]]<ref>''Boruto'' episode 160</ref> are capable of spitting senbon from their mouths, though it appears their usage utilise prepared metal senbon.
